name: Green Brick Apps
tag_list: cloud, technology, applications, development, computing, programming, design, network
overview: Green Brick Apps is an emerging technology application company that performs all administrative and productive tasks in a cloud system. They aim to be a team of skilled and multidisciplinary cloud workers, who operates at a fair, flexible, efficient, encouraging system, in which matters to be always under communication, cooperation and training. The members of Green Brick Apps participate in their own benefits through a new way of managing the company. By this way they can look forward to solve different challenges, take advantages on new needs and adapt to the scenario of the company. Maintaining a constant effort for improve their own technologies, products and human resources.
